page.title: 09SCORTON FEAST
page.content: The pet show is held at the back of the institute on a patch of grass. There were three catagories. The first was for big dogs,the second for small dogs and the third for any other animals. First of all you had to walk round in a circle,then make the dog sit down. After that the judges went round and asked how old the dogs were and what breed they were. After about five minutes they decided the winners. In the third catagory there were budgies,rabbits,hamsters and kittens. On Tuesday there was a five mile run starting at 3.30.Dougie aged 14 was the youngest runner,and there were 6 Richmond harriers among the 50 starters. The race started at the Institute,up to Forest, through Bolton-on-Swale and back to Scorton.
